title: Cocchi and Soda Recipe
full_text:
Cocchi and Soda Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/4
cup
Cocchi Americano Apertivo
Splash chilled
club soda
(up to
1
ounce
if desired)
Garnish:
orange twist
Directions
Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add Cocchi and stir twice to chill, add soda. Rub orange twist on rim of glass, then add to drink as garnish.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
